content: वाहनं [वाहयति वह्-णिच् ल्यु ल्युट् वा] {@--1@} Bearing, carrying, conveying. {@--2@} Driving (as a horse). {@--3@} A vehicle, conveyance of any kind; <ls>Ms. 7. 75</ls>; <ls>N. 22. 45.</ls> {@--4@} An animal used in riding or draught, as a horse; स दुष्प्रापयशाः प्रापदाश्रमं श्रांतवाहनः <ls>R. 1. 48</ls>, <ls n="R.">9. 25</ls>, <ls n="R. 9.">60.</ls> {@--5@} An elephant.
